```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.cap="Line graphs representing changes in O&M investment for categories over the years. Average rate of change per year for each category, where applicable, displayed on the graph in red"}
if (!(is.null(theme))) {
df <- try(plotSPA(om=index, which="omAllocation", theme=theme[i], dataframe = TRUE, approved=approved), silent=TRUE)
res <- try(plotSPA(index, which="omAllocation", theme=unique(index$theme), item=names(df)[j], approved=approved), silent=TRUE)
} else if (!(is.null(functionalGroup))) {
  df <- try(plotSPA(om=index, which="omAllocation", functionalGroup=functionalGroup[i], dataframe = TRUE, approved=approved), silent=TRUE)
res <- try(plotSPA(index, which="omAllocation", functionalGroup=unique(index$functional_group), item=names(df)[j], approved=approved), silent=TRUE)
} else if (!(is.null(section))) {
    df <- try(plotSPA(om=index, which="omAllocation", section=section[i], dataframe = TRUE, approved=approved), silent=TRUE)
res <- try(plotSPA(index, which="omAllocation", section=SEC, item=names(df)[j], approved=approved), silent = TRUE)
} else if (!(is.null(division))) {
      df <- try(plotSPA(om=index, which="omAllocation", division=division[i], dataframe = TRUE, approved=approved), silent=TRUE)
res <- try(plotSPA(index, which="omAllocation", division=DIV, item=names(df)[j], approved=approved), silent=TRUE)
}
